info.title: YetiForce API for Webservice App. Type: WebservicePremium
info.description:
Skip the `/webservice` fragment for connections via ApiProxy. There are two ways to connect to API, with or without rewrite, below are examples of both:
 * rewrite
 * - __CRM_URL__/webservice/WebservicePremium/Users/Login
 * - __CRM_URL__/webservice/WebservicePremium/Accounts/RecordRelatedList/117/Contacts
 * without rewrite
 * - __CRM_URL__/webservice.php?_container=WebservicePremium&module=Users&action=Login
 * - __CRM_URL__/webservice.php?_container=WebservicePremium&module=Accounts&action=RecordRelatedList&record=117&param=Contacts

fields.title: List of all available fields in the module

picklistvalues.title: Picklist values, available only for type of field: picklist, multipicklist, multiowner, multiReferenceValue, inventoryLimit, languages, currencyList, fileLocationType, taxes, multiListFields, mailScannerFields, country, modules, sharedOwner, categoryMultipicklist, tree

date-format.title: Date format, available only for type of field: date, datetime

time-format.title: Time format, available only for type of field: time

currency_symbol.title: Currency symbol, available only for type of field: currency

decimal_separator.title: Currency decimal separator, available only for type of field: currency

group_separator.title: Currency group separator, available only for type of field: currency

restrictedDomains.title: Email restricted domains, available only for type of field: email

yeti.com.description: List of domains reserved by email

limit.title: Limit the amount of images, available only for type of field: multiImage, image

formats.title: File Format, available only for type of field: multiImage, image

isViewable.description: Check if the field is viewable, depends on header `x-response-params`

isReadOnly.description: Check if the field is read only (based on profiles), depends on header `x-response-params`

isCreatable.description: Check if the field is creatable, depends on header `x-response-params`

isEditable.description: Check if the field is editable, depends on header `x-response-params`

isEditableReadOnly.description: Check if the field is editable or read only (based on the field type), depends on header `x-response-params`

isEditableHidden.description: Check if the field is hidden in the edit (based on the field type), depends on header `x-response-params`

dbStructure.title: Info about field structure in database, depends on header `x-response-params`

allowNull.description: Whether this column can be null.

phpType.description: The PHP type of this column.

dbType.description: The DB type of this column.

precision.description: Precision of the column data, if it is numeric.

scale.description: Scale of the column data, if it is numeric.

isPrimaryKey.description: Whether this column is a primary key

queryOperators.description: Field query operators, depends on header `x-response-params`

referenceList.title: List of related modules, available only for reference field

treeValues.title: Tree items, available only for tree field

defaultEditValue.title: Default field value in editable format

showtitle.description: Specifies whether the title should be visible

ineditview.description: Determines the visibility in edit view

indetailview.description: Determines the visibility in detail view

display_status.description: Determines whether the block should be expanded

iscustom.description: Determines if the block has been added by the user

inventory.title: Inventory field group, available depending on the type of module, depends on header `x-response-params`
